comment: She just gave me good college and classes advice, and just life advice in general. My mom was sick and I had to miss two labs but she worked with me to help me catch up and was already there when i needed extra help i just disliked how we had to have detailed lab notebook every class period

she is so sweet!! She responded to my emails sooo fast and her explanations were so good. Pay attention to her pre-lab lecture, she gives a lot of helpful tips on the experiment and how to do lab report. If you listen to what she says and come prepared for class you will do well! She gives detailed feedback on LabFlow so make sure to look at it

TAKE HER!!! She is a Grad student but she is amazing and really wants you to do well! She helped me so much and I thought I was going to fail but emailing and asking her for help made me pull up my grade so much and get A on final! A lot of work in class but if you do what she says and ask for help, you will be fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters
